summary:
• FY26 Guidance Reiterated:
  • Total income: $115m-$123m
  • Total spend: $127m-$133m

  • Macroeconomic/geopolitical risks noted (Middle East conflict).

  • FY25 Financials:

  • Total income: $90.5m (+27% YoY).
  • Pre-acquisition business Free Cash Flow: $7.4m (improved $14.5m YoY).

  • Net loss after tax: $(22.0m) (includes $5.1m non-cash impairment from GetThere acquisition).

  • Strategic Focus:

  • North America expansion: GetThere integration underway; Sabre partnership activated.
  • Platform acceleration: $40m investment over 4 years for AI/data capabilities.

  • Booking.com for Business: 3.3m completed room nights (+29% YoY); targets 4.2m+ in FY26.

  • Operational Highlights:

  • Australasian travel revenue: +18% YoY.

  • Cost discipline: Total spend/income ratio improved from 118% to 102%.

  • Board Update:

  • New independent director sought (global scale/travel tech expertise).
  • Clyde McConaghy retiring (non-executive director since 2014).

No capital raising or trading halt information identified.
